settings.heading: 1. DECLUTTER YOUR JEWELRY BOX
settings.row_content: Let's give your jewelry box a green makeover! Sort through your collection and identify pieces for a sustainable second life. Imagine, your pre-loved treasures could help a non-profit or power the future!

settings.heading: 2. ORDER YOUR FREE MAIL KIT
settings.row_content: Proceed by ordering your no-cost mail kit. It includes the essential packaging and prepaid shipping label to facilitate your jewelry recycling process.

settings.heading: 3. PACK AND SHIP
settings.row_content: Time to ship out your jewelry with that free mail kit and get it recycled! We accept costume and fine jewelry, including broken, unwanted, unused, or outdated. Let's ensure your cherished pieces don't go to waste!

settings.heading: CIRCULAR ECONOMY
settings.row_content: Our commitment is to extend your jewelry's lifespan. When you entrust us to recycle it, we will either reuse or recycle, adding more value.

settings.caption: Here's the scoop: when you recycle your jewelry by mail, we'll make sure it goes straight to some awesome nonprofit who work their magic and sell your treasures to fund community projects like job training and education.  Or we refine the precious metals to contribute to the supply necessary to build clean technology. So not only are you decluttering your jewelry, but you're also helping to make the world a better place. Talk about a win-win!
settings.heading: How It Works
1. Declutter Your Jewelry Box
settings.text: Let's give your jewelry box a green makeover! Sort through your collection and identify pieces for a sustainable second life. Imagine, your pre-loved treasures could help a non-profit or power the future!

settings.heading: 2. Order your Free Mail Kit
settings.text: Recycling with Redyoos is free and easy. Order your no-cost mail kit. It includes the essential packaging and prepaid shipping label to facilitate your jewelry recycling process.

settings.heading: 3. Pack and Ship
settings.text: Time to ship out your jewelry with that free mail kit and get it recycled! We accept costume and fine jewelry, including broken, unwanted, unused, or outdated. Let's ensure your cherished pieces don't go to waste!

settings.heading: 4. Feel Good about Where your Jewelry Goes
settings.text: Give new life to precious metal and clean energy. Your jewelry is reused by non-profits or recycled back into precious metal supply critical to making clean energy technology.
